title: Couple With Heart Person Person Light Skin Tone Medium Dark Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Person and Man Holding Hands with Heart
description: Represents a romantic couple with a person of light skin tone and a man of medium-dark skin tone, united by a heart symbol. It signifies love, romance, and diverse relationships.
apple_vendor_description: This heartwarming emoji on Apple devices depicts a loving couple, a woman and a person, with light and medium-dark skin tones respectively, embracing tenderly. A bright, glossy heart floats between them, rendered with Apple’s signature 3D shading and soft gradients, radiating warmth and affection. The gentle curves of their figures and the subtle lighting capture a moment of deep connection and romantic unity, making it a perfect symbol of love and partnership on Apple devices.
